title: junk mail and regular mail is mixed. there is no junk column. and no "settings" that I can find.
content: How do I access "settings" Can't find it. Why identify "junk" at all if it appears with the good mail. You identify junk but treat it like good mail. Ptesent it in the same column.
creator: klydwatkins

title: Recovering E-mails after compacting
content:
After compacting, nearly all my my e-mails that were stored in subfolders have disappeared. You indicated that most of these should be recoverable, but I'm unable to locate any process for doing so.

Some of these subfolders contained links to paid subscriptions, and of course - restoring those is pretty critical, both personally and professionally.

Please explain how to go about recovering all these missing e-mails. I cannot believe a regular maintenance procedure would result in such a significant data loss.

Many thanks and best regards!

John Van Epps johnvanepps0312@gmail.com
creator: johnvanepps0312

title: How to update software channel
content: I am running Version 128.10.1esr on Ubuntu Mate for RPI 5, do I need to change anything to update Thunderbird software channel, or I simply uninstall and reinstall Thunderbird will do, I don't need to backup.
creator: bilmenot

title: Keeps asking me to change my password
content:
Thunderbird, every time it starts tells me to change my password for "security device: software security device"

How do I stop this?
creator: mark28

title: Moving/Copying mails from 1 acount to another account in IMAP fails
content:
I have 2 imap accounts set up in Thunderbird. When I try to Copy/Move a message from 1 account to another account, thunderbird will return an error that the APPEND is missing ')'.

I have turned on MOZ_LOG and it shows that the append has is wrong as the line ends as UTF8 (~{348+}

According to AI the ~ was inserted and the ) was dropped. It should have send ...UTF8 ({348})

The dovecot IMAP server is rejecting the the append.

How can I resolve this?

Screenprint of the log attached.

Kind regards,

Leo
creator: clogandroid

title: Forgotten password
content: Hello I forgot my password for my Thunderbird account. I cant log to reset it. Is there any way to get password back using alternative email or phone number?

title: Lähetys ongelma
content:
Hei

Mistä johtuu, että thunderbird ottaa vastaan sähköpostit kaikilta palvelijoilta mutta lähetys ei aina onnistu. Varsinkaan microsoftin 365 palvelimen kautta lähetys ei pääsääntöisesti onnistu. Selaimen kautta microsoftin lähetys toimii hyvin.

Ongelma on ollut n. vuoden ajan. Tietokone on sama winn 11 laite. Asetukset ovat samat mitä ennenkin ovat olleet.

Terveisin, Jouni Hautala 

                 jouni.hautala@jhautala.fi
creator: joukaha

title: Add gnome-text-editor as *optional* helper for application/octet-stream
content:
Most attachments come through as application/octet-stream which I should be perfectly able to view via "gnome-text-editor" or "gedit" etc. I want to be given the option to use one of these.

I don't see any mechanism in the menus to allow this, though. The "application/octet-stream" is conspicuously absent from the content-type list, which is absurd since that's what 99% of all attachments are recognized as.

Note that I want this as an *OPTION* to going through the steps of downloading and then viewing the file.
creator: CarlPonder

title: Non vedo il contenuto delle mail
content: Buongiorno da un paio di giorni non riesco a vedere il contenuto di alcune mail arrivate negli ultimi mesi. Cliccando sulla mail vedo il mittente e l oggetto, ma il contenuto no. La pagina resta completamente bianca. Come posso risolvere questo problema? Saluti

title: Thunderbird does not allow to forward or reply to a message viewed in original HTML format.
content: When I try to reply (Gmail account) to a message viewed in Original HTML format, I get no space where I can respond anything. The same when I try to forward the message with a comment. When I view the message in Simple HTML or in plain text and hit the reply button there is no problem.
creator: herrmannrainer7

title: Email sent but cannot be saved
content: Hi. New windows 11 PC, Thunderbird nebula. 5 different email accounts. For the last few weeks intermittently Thunderbird says it has sent the message but it can't save it, and offers to only save it in local folders. Have tried recreating the accounts affected, repairing the sent folder on the accounts affected,changing the folder that sent items are saved in. Is it is intermittent. Sometimes closing Thunderbird and opening it up again solves the problem. Any help appreciated. Thanks
creator: andrewj1072
